valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Hebrides 982 expected north of Faeroes 986 by 1800 Tuesday. Low Shannon 999 expected southern England 998 by same time. New low expected Shannon 995 by that time
